statements: UPDATE Leaderboard SET game_score = 500, game_level = 3 WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE Leaderboard SET player_name = 'Alice', game_score = 700 WHERE player_id = 202

UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 100 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_rankings SET rank = 1 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = score + 100 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_rankings SET rank = rank + 1 WHERE player_id = 2
UPDATE players SET total_points = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_scores SET score = 1000 WHERE game_id = 2 AND player_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET total_points = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_genre = 'Adventure' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_category = 'Puzzle' WHERE game_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE games SET game_category = 'Strategy' WHERE game_id = 3;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 1000, player_name = 'Alice' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_stats SET total_games_played = total_games_played + 1, total_wins = total_wins + 1 WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 2;
